name: Aeolian
relicBonuses: After this relic or its bearer {ACTION_attacks}, it afflicts its target with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLIGHT}.
After the bearer is {ACTION_attacked}, this relic {ACTION_attacks} the enemy.
At the start of its bearer's turn, this relic {ACTION_casts} [icons,1972]Minor Healing on each enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLIGHT}.
This relic and its bearer deal additional damage to enemies equal to 15% of the damage that enemy has received from {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLIGHT}.
After the bearer afflicts an enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLIGHT}, it also afflicts them with {CONDNAME_BUFF_MEND}.
This relic and its bearer give 50% more healing to enemies with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLIGHT}.
After the bearer afflicts an enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLIGHT}, it also afflicts them with {CONDNAME_BUFF_LEECH}.
This relic {ACTION_casts} spells as if it has 30% more {STAT_intelligence} for each enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLIGHT}.
After the bearer {ACTION_casts} a healing spell on an enemy with {CONDNAME_DEBUFF_BLIGHT}, this relic {ACTION_casts} [icons,1972]Major Healing on the target.
title: God of Frost
